Search AdminLTE 2 shinydashboard variables

Source: R/search-vars.R
search_vars_adminlte2.Rd

Search AdminLTE 2 shinydashboard variables

search_vars_adminlte2(pattern = NULL)

Arguments

pattern

A pattern to filter the results.

Value

a data.frame with two columns:

  • variable : name of the variable.

  • value default value used.

Examples

# All AdminLTE2 variables
search_vars_adminlte2()
#>                                variable                                  value
#> 1                            light-blue                                #3c8dbc
#> 2                                   red                                #dd4b39
#> 3                                 green                                #00a65a
#> 4                                  aqua                                #00c0ef
#> 5                                yellow                                #f39c12
#> 6                                  blue                                #0073b7
#> 7                                  navy                                #001F3F
#> 8                                  teal                                #39CCCC
#> 9                                 olive                                #3D9970
#> 10                                 lime                                #01FF70
#> 11                               orange                                #FF851B
#> 12                              fuchsia                                #F012BE
#> 13                               purple                                #605ca8
#> 14                               maroon                                #D81B60
#> 15                                black                                   #111
#> 16                             gray-lte                                #d2d6de
#> 17                        sidebar-width                                  230px
#> 18               boxed-layout-max-width                                 1024px
#> 19               screen-header-collapse                         $screen-xs-max
#> 20                           link-color                            $light-blue
#> 21                     link-hover-color              lighten($link-color, 15%)
#> 22                              body-bg                 #ecf0f5  // DEPRECATED
#> 23                           content-bg                                #ecf0f5
#> 24                               box-bg                                #ffffff
#> 25                          info-box-bg                                #ffffff
#> 26                      sidebar-dark-bg                                #222d32
#> 27                sidebar-dark-hover-bg           darken($sidebar-dark-bg, 2%)
#> 28                   sidebar-dark-color         lighten($sidebar-dark-bg, 60%)
#> 29             sidebar-dark-hover-color                                   #fff
#> 30              sidebar-dark-submenu-bg          lighten($sidebar-dark-bg, 5%)
#> 31           sidebar-dark-submenu-color lighten($sidebar-dark-submenu-bg, 40%)
#> 32     sidebar-dark-submenu-hover-color                                   #fff
#> 33                     sidebar-light-bg                                #f9fafc
#> 34               sidebar-light-hover-bg                 lighten(#f0f0f1, 1.5%)
#> 35                  sidebar-light-color                                   #444
#> 36            sidebar-light-hover-color                                   #000
#> 37             sidebar-light-submenu-bg                $sidebar-light-hover-bg
#> 38          sidebar-light-submenu-color                                   #777
#> 39    sidebar-light-submenu-hover-color                                   #000
#> 40              sidebar-expanded-shadow             3px 0 8px rgba(0,0,0,.125)
#> 41                control-sidebar-width                         $sidebar-width

#> 46                          box-padding                                   10px
#> 47         box-default-border-top-color                                #d2d6de
#> 48                        btn-boxshadow                                   none
#> 49           progress-bar-border-radius                                    1px
#> 50        progress-bar-sm-border-radius                                    1px
#> 51        progress-bar-xs-border-radius                                    1px
#> 52                         input-radius                                      0
#> 53                    btn-border-radius                                    3px
#> 54                   direct-chat-height                                  250px
#> 55           direct-chat-default-msg-bg                              $gray-lte
#> 56       direct-chat-default-font-color                                   #444
#> 57 direct-chat-default-msg-border-color                              $gray-lte
#> 58             attachment-border-radius                                    3px
#> 59                     transition-speed                                    .3s
#> 60                        transition-fn                            ease-in-out

# Only sidebar related variables
search_vars_adminlte2(pattern = "sidebar")
#>                             variable                                  value
#> 17                     sidebar-width                                  230px
#> 26                   sidebar-dark-bg                                #222d32
#> 27             sidebar-dark-hover-bg           darken($sidebar-dark-bg, 2%)
#> 28                sidebar-dark-color         lighten($sidebar-dark-bg, 60%)
#> 29          sidebar-dark-hover-color                                   #fff
#> 30           sidebar-dark-submenu-bg          lighten($sidebar-dark-bg, 5%)
#> 31        sidebar-dark-submenu-color lighten($sidebar-dark-submenu-bg, 40%)
#> 32  sidebar-dark-submenu-hover-color                                   #fff
#> 33                  sidebar-light-bg                                #f9fafc
#> 34            sidebar-light-hover-bg                 lighten(#f0f0f1, 1.5%)
#> 35               sidebar-light-color                                   #444
#> 36         sidebar-light-hover-color                                   #000
#> 37          sidebar-light-submenu-bg                $sidebar-light-hover-bg
#> 38       sidebar-light-submenu-color                                   #777
#> 39 sidebar-light-submenu-hover-color                                   #000
#> 40           sidebar-expanded-shadow             3px 0 8px rgba(0,0,0,.125)
#> 41             control-sidebar-width                         $sidebar-width
